DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study FK-506 Cyclosporine Vernal Keratoconjunctivits ( VKC )
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Vernal keratoconjunctivitis ( VKC ) serious , sight-threatening ocular disease , occur mainly child . Prolonged use ophthalmic corticosteroid usually require severe case could lead serious complication glaucoma cataract . Cyclosporine tacrolimus among new treatment VKC . Objective : To compare efficacy 0.1 % tacrolimus ( FK-506 ) ophthalmic ointment 2 % cyclosporine eye drop treatment VKC . Methods : Twenty-four patient VKC recruit . After 2 week-washout period , randomize 2 group double-blinded , parallel fashion . The first group receive 0.1 % FK-506 eye ointment placebo eye drop second group receive 2 % cyclosporine eye drop placebo ointment 8 week . Thereafter , patient receive open-treatment 0.1 % FK-506 eye ointment another 4 week . Subjective ocular symptom side effect score patient entry , end 1st , 4th , 8th 12th week . Objective ocular sign evaluate ophthalmologist ( PK ) follow visit .
